patched_yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: image-demo-8749
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:stable
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      privileged: false
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: image-demo-8749
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:stable
    securityContext:
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: image-demo-8749
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:stable
    securityContext:
      runAsNonRoot: true
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: image-demo-8749
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:stable
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: crimson
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: crimson
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: crimson
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: app
        image: localhost:32000/crimson:stable
        env:
        - name: TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: discord-secrets
              key: token
        - name: DB_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: db-credentials
              key: dbPassword
        - name: REST_USER_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: crimson-credentials
              key: userName
        - name: REST_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: crimson-credentials
              key: password
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              name: db-config
              key: port
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              name: db-config
              key: user
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              name: db-config
              key: name
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: db-credentials
              key: dbHost
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /logs
          name: logs
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: logs
        hostPath:
          path: /opt/kubernetes/logs

        - name: DB_PASS

        - name: REST_USER_NAME

        - mountPath: /logs
          name: logs
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: vladimir44/microservices-demo-frontend:0.0.2
        name: frontend
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-readiness-probe
        resources: {}
        env:
        - name: PRODUCT_CATALOG_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: productcatalogservice:3550
        - name: CURRENCY_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: currencyservice:7000
        - name: CART_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: cartservice:7070
        - name: RECOMMENDATION_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: recommendationservice:8080
        - name: CHECKOUT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: checkoutservice:5050
        - name: SHIPPING_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shippingservice:50051
        - name: AD_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: adservice:9555
        - name: ENV_PLATFORM
          value: gcp
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
